Header: HE the President Promotes 63 Senior Officers to Next Rank on Commander’s Recommendations
Content: HE the President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces with the concurrence of the Ministry of Defence and recommendations of the Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva has promoted a total of 63 Senior Officers to their respective next ranks, retrospectively, one of the largest segment of promotions, made in recent times, a communiqué of the Military Secretariat Branch announced this evening (16). Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva and All Ranks Extend Their Best Wishes to All 4 new Major Generals, 25 Brigadiers and 34 Lieutenant Colonels of the Army.
